DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate efficacy saredutant 100mg 30mg daily combination paroxetine 20mg daily compare saredutant placebo combination paroxetine 20mg daily patient major depressive disorder . The study also include double-placebo group ( saredutant placebo combination paroxetine placebo ) .
DOC.brief_title: An Eight-week Study Saredutant Paroxetine Combination Treatment Major Depressive Disorder
